newsitem.title: USA: Biomet Inc sets initial annual dividend.
newsitem.headline: Biomet Inc sets initial annual dividend.

text.p: Biomet Inc said Friday its board of directors declared an annual cash dividend of $0.10 a share.
The dividend is payable November 22 to shareholders of record at the close of business on October 25.
Biomet said the dividend is the first in the company's history.

"In declaring this dividend, the board of directors has adopted a policy of paying annual cash dividends, the amounts of which will be determined with reference to the company's earnings, capital requirements and other relevant factors," Dane Miller, president, said in a statement.
Biomet designs, makes and markets products used by orthopedic medical specialists.
